title: Sound On: Bezos and Branson in Space
itunes:title: Sound On: Bezos and Branson in Space
description:
Description:

Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Antitrust Litigation Analyst, Jennifer Rie, former FTC chairman William Kovacic, Bloomberg Economics Chief Economist Tom Orlik, Massachusetts Congressman Jake Auchincloss, Bloomberg Politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, and Bloomberg Businessweek reporter Ashlee Vance.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
